website_summaries.verdict: Watch your friendship bloom with the enthusiastic Blossom as you pet and tickle her petal-hued fur.
pros: Expresses up to 50 reactions when you press nose or pet touch sensors
Light-up eyes change color with Blossom's mood
Attach to your purse, arm, or backpack with twist-lock tail
cons: Brush carefully as toy may shed fur

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I realize that most reviews are less than thrilling, however my 7 year old, autistic and adhd daughter loves it! She is very empathetic and loves to take care of her new pomsie. She has had this for a few days and while she destroys most toys, she is taking specia care of this one. I love that it’s interactive and responsive. Definitely give it a chance especially for $15, and using a regular AAA battery.
customer_reviews.author: Raluca Isenberg

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old wanted one of these so bad, she saved her money and had me order her one. I was leary after reading some reviews but she loves it. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it does she BAD. My kitchen table was covered in the fur so now I make her keep it in her room or outside. I can see it being creepy but she don't sleep with it so it won't turn on at night.
customer_reviews.author: Younique by Crissy

customer_reviews.title: The pink one didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I pre-ordered 2 of these in different colors and received them at the end of July but was saving them for my 2 daughters’ birthday. One worked and is really adorable, the other doesn’t work. I pulled the tab and nothing, tried changing the battery and it still doesn’t work. Since I preordered and held on to it for a birthday, I am outside of the return window so I guess I’m stuck with the dud unfortunately. Make sure you check it if you are holding on to it for Christmas or something!
customer_reviews.author: Emily W

customer_reviews.title: Pomsies are Us (Granddaughter and Me)
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my granddaughter, age 9. A toy but not a toy for a little girl who is growing up. She can take it to school (hopefully without pressing its nose). She loves it; I like it. (Note: I like the size of the Pomsies. They are not as small as Shopkins or LOLs, but not as large as the FurReal pets.) At home, lights and sounds allows for imaginative play pets.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: We've had 2, and both went defective quickly.
customer_reviews.text: My older daughter got one of these for Christmas, and her little sister wanted one too. The first one we had started acting weird and not doing anything but making a weird chirp sound when she tried to turn it on. We thought it was because the dog had gotten a hold of it and ran through the house with it in his mouth for a few minutes before we caught him. I bought another one for my younger daughter a few weeks later. The dog never got a hold of that one, but the same weird glitchy/chirping happened within a few days of use with that one too. They are cute, but I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Pomsies
customer_reviews.text: My daughter began screaming of excitement as soon as she opened the package! According to her words: "I loved it! Just loved it!"
customer_reviews.author: Helena Demedeiros

customer_reviews.title: Potentially scary for kids under the suggested age
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my three year old niece and she loved it. I only was able to mess around with it for a few minutes but the first thing I noticed was that the eyes light up yellow and green and it’s scary. The bright colored eyes change a fun toy to a fluffy Chucky. This is not stopping me to from purchasing another as a gift for a friends older (8 year old) daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Family

customer_reviews.title: Pomsie cats
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but I recently bought two Pomsie cats to gift to twin girls (4 years old), for their birthday. They went crazy for them ... Chloe and Bella loved trying to get the cats to purr. Only setback was that they were fighting over Blossom. I should have bought them each the same one. Anyway, just wanted to share, since the girls enjoyed them so much!
customer_reviews.author: Nehemiah

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old has been wanting one of these ever since she saw it on tv, or youtube... somewhere... She takes this thing everywhere!! They were genious by making the tail movable to put on wrist and my daughter will wear it on her wrist everywhere!!! She gets upset I wont let her take it to school! it is soft, makes cute noises (that turn annoying after you hear them again and again and again!) :) She is getting lots of fun out of this toy for being a relatively lower price toy!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Nice noises, but did not stay on the arm
customer_reviews.text: This is a head (ball) with a tail. I do not like the fact that it never stayed on her arm. At the beginning she loved rubbing the head and the cat noises, but about 4 months later she is scared of it. I would have rated it at least a 4 if the tail would stay on her arm. The cat noises are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGuest

customer_reviews.title: Good but Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my daughter and one for my niece. They really loved them! Maybe too much. Within 3 weeks they are now down to only making one noise instead of the variety of functions. They still bend the tails around things and play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Huge hit with the little ones
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my 3 year old granddaughter for Christmas, as well as one for my 6-1/2 year old granddaughter. They both loved them and played with them for hours on in. I highly recommend this toy for Christmas or birthday - the kids love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Yellowrose0310

customer_reviews.title: Another cute toy
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this thing 4 stars because it is very similar to most other furry toys, not very original. It responds when you pet it and that’s about it. It was a Christmas gift and my daughter was into it for about a week. They are cute, but gets old fast.
customer_reviews.author: Felish T

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got it as a Christmas gift and it didn't work. We changed the battery but it didn't help. Such a waste of money.....
customer_reviews.author: Jared E.

customer_reviews.title: The wrap around doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift, so figured I'd wait to do this after some time has past. As any toy, she out grew the WOW, new best toy syndrome. It was fun...for a while. The whole wristband thing is NOT as it described, it doesn't hold! Too loose. For the cost, it was kinda worth it. Do it again...probably not.
customer_reviews.author: JET

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was more music
customer_reviews.text: Made it seem like there would be multiple music tracks but so far we can only get the same one every time. Still pretty cool with changes in mood
customer_reviews.author: KTD

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE *** Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a cute interactive toy, nothing grande, simple but cute. You can not understand one word or thing this toy says, certainly not English. Only think you can recognize is the odd purr sound. Not as cute as the picture, I read reviews before making purchase and have a hard time believing they are real. Not worth $2 let alone $15!
customer_reviews.author: 2boyz2raze

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old and 9 year old each received one. The 3 year old still isn't too sure about hers. My 9 year old told me she didn't want one, but when she got one for Christmas she was excited. She plays with them and loves to swing them around to make them sing quickly. It's a cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: This thing doesn't work, was a bday gift, bad experience
customer_reviews.text: The plush toy was supposed to be a birthday gift which didn't work after opening the box. The little girl was upset. Wet thought it was a battery but no, put in new batteries and still not working. Very upset. Will give another try by purchasing another one. Returning this one :(
customer_reviews.author: Roman S.

customer_reviews.title: After it purrs, makes noises, and the eyes glow - then what?
customer_reviews.text: Kittens are cute. Purring is cute. Big kitty eyes are cute. Girls like pink kitties. All of that doesn't add up to much in the way of imaginary play. After it performs once or twice, it's over. Rather stiff and not cuddly at all. Should have thought it out before.
customer_reviews.author: Alvae96Top Contributor: Fantasy Books

customer_reviews.title: Seriously adorable
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, this is sooo cute! My 4 year old daughter loves it! It does cute little things...my favorite is when it purrs when you pet it. The battery doesn't last super long, but it only takes one AAA battery so that's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my granddaughter. She is having so much fun with this. She loves it, and we are happy we purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: It arrived before Christmas. Packaging was untampered and perfect. However, my daughter opened her Pomsie on Christmas Day and it didn't work. We changed the batteries and it still didn't work. We got on from Walmart the next day that did work.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Interesting
customer_reviews.text: Ours didn't work right away. We changed out the batteries and it still didn't work. So we hit it on its head and then it started making sounds. Still have to do that to turn it on each time or else it does nothing. The kid was slightly let down since she was so excited to get it and it isn't quite what she expected.
customer_reviews.author: NATHAN  SNOKE

customer_reviews.title: Gah - so useless!!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are so absolutely useless!! They are cute, no doubt, but they don't do A THING!!! My kids really, really wanted these but when they got them, they were so unhappy because they do nothing. Huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Adorably made fun
customer_reviews.text: Even as a person well over a half of century plus old i still love toys i got this to play jokes on my cats wow so adorable its selling out in stores got my neice one for xmascant eait to see her as she asked for one i love it
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: Great interactive plush
customer_reviews.text: The cat itself is awesome and the eyes light up very bright. My daughter and neices love them! The only problem is that the tail doesn’t wrap very tightly on their arms to “stay” in place... especially on my 9yr old who is very skinny. Overall a great buy :)
customer_reviews.author: Shaidaee

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Box came a little damaged and the fur was super flattened (reason for the missing star) but overall I think my kiddo will be very happy to open this come Christmas morning
customer_reviews.author: Jesica Staples

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Can’t give 5 only because they are Christmas gifts and haven’t been used yet.. but they look fantastic and I think my kids will be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Donna R.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My nieces loved and I mean loved these! They are super cute and perfect for a 6 and 7 year old ( and certainly could work for younger). Terrific and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Cute fluff ball
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little toy but sometimes glitches and will make a weird noise. Not super interactive but still fun for the kids. When it purrs it vibrates quite a bit which can be startling to littles, so just be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Oswaldo Cuautle

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft
customer_reviews.text: Cute and soft There are small parts so small children should not have these especially if they tend to put things in their mouth’s
customer_reviews.author: Sandee C

customer_reviews.title: Not too sure about this one
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first, but after only 3 days, got garbly sound and didn't give opportunity to feed it. Too bad, the thing burped and tooted, so funny!!! Not sure if we will try to get another one yet... returning this Blossom one.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R.

customer_reviews.title: Think furry tomigatchi.
customer_reviews.text: Like a furry tomigatchi (except not on all the time for constant demands). Well received gift by a six year old who loves cats. Fun interactive toy.
customer_reviews.author: FiestyBerry

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay. Wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: The toy is cute but it doesn’t do much. Makes noises. I expected it to be interactive like a Furbe.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I’d Throw it Away if only my daughter wouldn’t be devastated :(
customer_reviews.text: I literally hate this thing so much I wish I could just throw it away! It’s like a furby... only most of what it says is unintelligible and repeats the same few things over and over... my daughter love it though.
customer_reviews.author: Looking for the Perfect Item

customer_reviews.title: cute for christmas
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter's christmas so hopefully she loves it :) amazon has done really good lately with combining orders previously made with free shipping! so nice!
customer_reviews.author: MamaB.

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts for 3-5 year olds
customer_reviews.text: Great gifts for little girls. They loved them and play with them still 6 months later
customer_reviews.author: ENC

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy. Bought for my granddaughter for Christmas. Reminds me of the Furbies ( I think that was the name) from years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Imagammie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy. My 3 yr old loves it but will understand it more as she gets okder
customer_reviews.author: Charae Nielson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my 5 yr. Old daughter. She absolutely loves it. Very cool new toy.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy but interest fades quickly...
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy, kids like to play with but I notice the fun wears off fairly quickly and they move on to another toy...
customer_reviews.author: Mommarhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and can not wait to give these to my granddaughters for Christmas. The colors match what was advertised
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Pomsies! Love Em
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter but I think I really bought it for myself. Pomsies areao flipping cute. They interact with you with a push of their nose. I plan on getting myself more! Lol
customer_reviews.author: HardCayndae

customer_reviews.title: Send the kids to another room
customer_reviews.text: Noise pollution that keeps my kids entertained longer than electronic toys usually do. I hate it, they LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but I bought this for my niece for christmas so I don't have an opinion on the durability of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Mcvey

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea where it is now, but she loved it for the first couple of days. It's a fun toy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ann Dulcie

customer_reviews.title: Packaging came crushed, almost looks used. Not able to gift as hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Package came completely crushed. Wanted to gift this item, but slightly embarrassed to in its condition.
customer_reviews.author: Alex D

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this annoying thing lol the only thing I don’t like is that you have to wait for it to fall asleep to shut up.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Heacock

customer_reviews.title: It's top heavy doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute little animal but the head is to heavy and doesn't stay upright on my granddaughters wrist
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Seven year old daughter's birthday fav. Currently hanging from anything horizontal.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.

customer_reviews.title: A well-received birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: This adorable little Pomsies Blossom Plush Toy was a hit with my 6 year old niece. Take a bow Aunty - if you are considering this as a gift - go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Tarianne

customer_reviews.title: Really cute and great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was pleased, they were exactly as expected. Super soft and cute 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Maranda Bellamy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Literally adorable. I think I like it more than my kid does
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work:(.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this item did not work, even after changing batteries. This was a Christmas gift...so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far its cute, but its not out of the box. its a Christmas present!!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Big hit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy. It is cute and easy to turn on/off
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Cute and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old and 11year old both loved these.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it so much they play with it right away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuddle buddy for life
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Christmas and still is as great the day she opened it. Still running in same batteries too. This is great for a cuddle buddy!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Edens

customer_reviews.title: It's OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: Kids didn't really care for these. I wasted my money on buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap toy, don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: The one eye is inside of the toys head and covered in the material. It looks like it only has one big eye and the other is covered. I turned it on and you can see it’s clearly defective when the lights are on. Seriously dissapointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better get em while you can!
customer_reviews.text: Too cute!!!Get these hot cutie pies while you can, these are going to be popular for Christmas!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gramel

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget to get another one for the other sibling!!!! Because they will not be sharing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this toy for my niece, and she loves playing with it. She hangs it from her arm and other things in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Perry

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: There have been better toys out there. It doesn't really do a whole lot.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought it didn't work until I saw the tab to "remove". Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Works good. No issues.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daugther for Christmas and she loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Hypatia Alexandria Smith

customer_reviews.title: Diappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the toy. I heard it was going to be all the rage at Christmas - not so!!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy. Creepy in an a cute way. Very amusing..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only had it for a little over a month & it has a glitch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my daughter this toy for Christmas and it already has a glitch. You press the nose & it repeats like a broken record. Not sure what happened but it was working fine & my daughter loved it. Just disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Awwwww
customer_reviews.text: This was for my niece. She liked it so much that I ended up getting one more in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these adorable Pomsies for kids ages 3-8. They have been a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mary Carl

customer_reviews.title: 4-yr old very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it, I find it slightly annoying as with all toys that make noise.
customer_reviews.author: Jen W.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter gives it 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved her Pomsie! Super fluffy and really cute
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful interactive toy
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was dumb but then after playing with it I thought it was ingenious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FUN GIFT FOR GIRL
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my friend's first grader for Christmas. She loved it! So glad I found it on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: I received it on time and seems to be fine.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen it work. It's a Christmas present for my granddaughter. Y
customer_reviews.author: Delores Hyder

customer_reviews.title: Cheap toy
customer_reviews.text: In the photos it looks so cute and soft and is supposed to be a hot toy this holiday season so I bought two. I was surprised when I received them how small they are but also the fur is very rough, it isn't soft at all. I sent both back, they are not worth the $15 each I paid, looks like something I could have bought at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. Got it much cheaper than in stores
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Not wow, but very nice
customer_reviews.text: Oh, it's nice! Reminds me Furby, but much more cutier.
customer_reviews.author: Kamila

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product??
customer_reviews.text: It just came in today and it looks nothing like the picture. It has bat wings and horns. I thought it was supposed to be a cat??
customer_reviews.author: Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Daughter saw this on tv and she wanted it so bad. She loves it. Currently sleeping with it and a huge smile.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Worth It and Not Annoying!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves that she can hold this in one hand and wrap the tail around her wrist. It thankfully isn’t too loud or annoying. My 4 month old son even really likes it because it’s eyes glow and it will vibrate on a certain setting. It just don’t waste batteries like crazy like some of her other toys do. I’m really happy we got this for Christmas! Definitely worth more than what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah P.

customer_reviews.title: Good and funn. Sheds a little will brushing
customer_reviews.text: It's a good toy and my daughter loves it. She's over a year old and the toy keeps her very entertained. The small problem with it was that it came with battery's already worn down so i had to change them almost immediately. It was just a minor inconvenience. What truly botherd me is that it sheds a little while brushing, tough not enough to cause a problem. If you have a small child just dont let them brush them with the little brush that comes with it. All in all i am still satisfied with it and do not regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: cute and adorable
customer_reviews.text: Pomsies are fun as they are an interactive toy ---it purrs, says it is hungry, plays music, and it's eyes changes colors. Their fur is soft and has a comb to fluff it up. My grandkids and niece loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Blanche

product_meta.title: Pomsies 1879 Blossom Plush Interactive Toys, One Size, Pink
product_meta.description: Pomsies are loveable, fashionable, interactive pom pom pets you can take anywhere. Each pomsie has soft, cuddly fur and a tail that wraps around your wrist, hair, clothing and more! Pomsies are loveable, fashionable, interactive pom pom pets you can take anywhere. Each pomsie has soft, cuddly fur and a tail that wraps around your wrist, hair, clothing and more!
feature_bullets: Pomsies will tell you when they feel tired, cold or Hungry with adorable light up eyes, purring and cute sounds…only you can give them what they need!
Take it to a new level with a special freeze dance mode you can play with you and your friends!
Reacts to touch! Light up eyes communicate how they feel!
Touch sensors – pet them, hug them, love them. Over 50 cute sounds!
Twist and lock tail - a great accessory for your backpack, wrist, hair and more!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars392 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
